display_long_description: Step into the driver’s seat in TurboRace, the VR racing game that brings high-speed action right to your Meta Quest headset. TurboRace transports you to stunning tracks filled with sleek, futuristic cars and thrilling challenges around every corner. Engage in intense races against skilled opponents, using strategic power-ups to gain the edge. Feel the rush as you maneuver through dynamic environments with responsive controls and smooth VR mechanics that keep you fully immersed in the race. Each course is a high-octane journey, with breathtaking visuals, dust trails, and neon-lit tracks that amplify the excitement. Whether dodging obstacles, hitting top speeds, or sliding into sharp turns, TurboRace offers an unmatched sense of realism and thrill. Designed for fans of both casual and hardcore racing, TurboRace challenges you to master the track and claim the championship. Test your reflexes, feel the adrenaline, and get ready to race your way to the top—exclusively on Meta Quest.
